ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark - Evil Outpost Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: you have to get to threatening to raise it to dubious. I dunno if you can raise it enough to do the quest... You been hunting in karnors? Minkin Sol Ro ...
ygData.messageBody:
you have to get to threatening to raise it to dubious. I dunno if you can
raise it enough to do the quest... You been hunting in karnors?

Minkin
Sol Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Mott, Mike J. [mailto:mike.j.mott@...]
Sent: October 23, 2000 10:48 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Kunark - Evil Outpost Faction



I just got my Mask of Deception (yeah yeah I know..I should have had this
thing 15 levels ago) and the evil Dragoons in The Overthere still are
scowling ready to attack when I am a Delf.

I am a half-elf Bard, Quellious is my Diety. Is there any way to use the
Charismatic Carrilion (sp?) to up faction enough to turn in the braids for
faction increases?

Lago Bardoon of Bertoxx, 45th Composition, Defenders of Aleria


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
